refreshToken.title: Tesla API Refresh Token
refreshToken.description: Read the documentation to learn how to get a refresh token.

prefix.title: Services Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix for all services. Useful if you have multiple Tesla vehicles. Example: 'Climate' becomes 'Model S Climate'.

waitMinutes.title: Time in minutes to wait for the car to wake up (default is 1 minute)

chargeLimit.title: Charge Limit
chargeLimit.description: Example: 'Set the Charge Limit to 80%'. NOTE: Will appear in HomeKit as a Light bulb! There's no other way to do it.

climateSwitch.title: Climate Switch
climateSwitch.description: If on, climate will be controlled by a switch instead of a thermostat. NOTE: This will not allow you to set a temperature.

steeringWheelHeater.title: Steering Wheel Heater
steeringWheelHeater.description: Example: 'Turn on the Steering Wheel Heater'

celsius.title: Use Celsius
celsius.description: Uses celsius for degrees in supported services

charger.title: Charger
charger.description: Example: 'Turn on the Charger' to begin charging the car

chargingAmps.title: Charging Amps
chargingAmps.description: Example: 'Set the Charging amps to 24'. NOTE: Will appear in HomeKit as a Light bulb! There's no other way to do it.

starter.title: Starter
starter.description: Example: 'Turn on the Starter' to enable keyless driving

homeLink.title: Homelink
homeLink.description: Example: 'Open Homelink' to open the garage door (requires latitude and longitude set)

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Latitude of your Homelink device. Required if Homelink is enabled.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Longitude of your Homelink device. Required if Homelink is enabled.

china.title: Use China Authentication Servers
china.description: Experimental flag for users in China.
